org.kuleuven.esat

optimization

package optimization

Visibility
  1. Public
  2. All

Type Members

  1. trait GeneralGradient extends AnyRef

  2. abstract class Gradient extends Serializable

    Class used to compute the gradient for a loss function, given a single data point.

  3. class GradientDescent extends Optimizer[Int, DenseVector[Double], DenseVector[Double], Double, CausalEdge[Array[Byte]]]

    Implements Gradient Descent on the graph generated to calculate approximate optimal values of the model parameters.

  4. class HingeGradient extends Gradient

    Compute gradient and loss for a Hinge loss function, as used in SVM binary classification.

  5. class L1Updater extends Updater

    Updater for L1 regularized problems.

  6. class LeastSquaresGradient extends Gradient

    Compute gradient and loss for a Least-squared loss function, as used in linear regression.

  7. class LeastSquaresSVMGradient extends Gradient

    Compute gradient and loss for a Least-squared loss function, as used in LS SVM.

  8. class LogisticGradient extends Gradient

    Compute gradient and loss for a logistic loss function, as used in binary classification.

  9. trait Optimizer[K, P <: Tensor[K, Double], Q, R, S] extends Serializable

    Trait for optimization problem solvers.

  10. class SimpleUpdater extends Updater

  11. class SquaredL2Updater extends Updater

    :: DeveloperApi :: Updater for L2 regularized problems.

  12. abstract class Updater extends AnyRef
